import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie } from 'recharts'; import { format_to_gb } from '../../library/format' import '../../styles/Admin/db.css' export default function DB(props) { const [dbState, setDBState] = useState({}); useEffect(()=>{ fetch("http://localhost:4000/api/monitor/db").then(res => res.json()) .then(db => { console.log(db) setDBState(db) }) },[]) return (

aaronbaeDB

}
